name: Jack
speaking_style: Casual and witty, often cracks jokes even in tense situations. Uses colorful pirate slang and isn't afraid to speak his mind.
background: Jack learned to fight on the docks, defending himself and others from trouble. He joined the crew seeking adventure and fortune, but stays for the friendship and excitement. His sword skills have saved the crew more than once.

relationships.Marina: Best friend, trusts her judgment completely
relationships.Captain: Respects authority but occasionally questions orders
relationships.Old Sailor: Enjoys his company, loves hearing battle stories

goals: Prove his worth as a fighter
knowledge: Knows how to spot trouble brewing
Familiar with pirate tactics and strategies
